rows.label: bf02400100_0010
rows.name: These flames again!

rows.label: bf02400100_0020
rows.name: It's her!

rows.label: bf02400100_0030
rows.name: And with her Driver too, this time.

rows.label: bf02400100_0040
rows.name: That's Meleph, the Flamebringer!

rows.label: bf02400100_0050
rows.name: Meleph?

rows.label: bf02400100_0060
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor Meleph of
Superbia.

rows.label: bf02400100_0070
rows.name:
The most powerful Driver in the Empire...
and wielder of Kagutsuchi, the most powerful Blade.

rows.label: bf02400100_0080
rows.name:
So together they're, like...
ULTRA powerful?!

rows.label: bf02400100_0090
rows.name: It looks like they were waiting for us.

rows.label: bf02400100_0100
rows.name:
Yes indeed. 
I did feel like we got away a little too easily.

rows.label: bf02400100_0110
rows.name:
I don't know why I expected Morph
to slow you down at all.

rows.label: bf02400100_0120
rows.name: It was you, right?

rows.label: bf02400100_0130
rows.name:
You're the one who spread the rumor that I was going
to be executed, just to lure Rex and the others here!

rows.label: bf02400100_0140
rows.name:
You catch on quickly.
Yes, you certainly proved useful.

rows.label: bf02400100_0150
rows.name: However-

rows.label: bf02400100_0160
rows.name: Rex and Homura are the real prize.

rows.label: bf02400100_0170
rows.name: Hah, not quite.

rows.label: bf02400100_0180
rows.name:
The emerald Core Crystal is the sign of
the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf02400100_0190
rows.name:
If that Blade is indeed the Holy Grail...
then there's something I must do.

rows.label: bf02400100_0200
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: bf02400100_0210
rows.name: The power to sunder Alst itself...

rows.label: bf02400100_0220
rows.name: I cannot allow her to burn the world down again.

rows.label: bf02400100_0230
rows.name:
Homura...destroyed the world?
Don't be so stupid!

rows.label: bf02400100_0240
rows.name:
You mean you didn't know? Five hundred
years ago, during the Holy Grail War...

rows.label: bf02400100_0250
rows.name:
The legendary power that sunk three continents
to the Cloud Sea's bed.

rows.label: bf02400100_0260
rows.name: Three Divine Beasts...destroyed?

rows.label: bf02400100_0270
rows.name: I speak naught but historical fact.

rows.label: bf02400100_0280
rows.name:
I'm onto you! You want to use
Homura as some kinda weapon!

rows.label: bf02400100_0290
rows.name: We're not gonna let you do that!

rows.label: bf02400100_0300
rows.name:
That is precisely the kind of
scenario that I mean to prevent.

rows.label: bf02400100_0310
rows.name: And what if we resist?

rows.label: bf02400100_0320
rows.name: Then I will have to restrain you by force.

rows.label: bf02400100_0330
rows.name: In that case, I'll make this nice and clear.

rows.label: bf02400100_0332
rows.name: Surely.

rows.label: bf02400100_0334
rows.name: Never!

rows.label: bf02400100_0340
rows.name:
Hah. Then let's see if you have the
strength to back up those words, boy!
